column2: bp <- ggplot(dt.ps1.v1.cst.rich, aes(x = (factor(dt.ps1.v1.cst.rich$SampleID, levels = sample.order)), y = ShannonLgT, color = CSTs)) +

gg.ps1.v1.cst.observed <- ggplot(dt.ps1.v1.cst.rich, aes(x = STI, y = Observed,  color = bvscat)) +
